title: Fix user guide to describe new usage of kp_velocity and provide description

content.raw:
Recent changes (2.6.1) provide a set_joint_damping service, and it appears that kp_velocity is used both in control damping and to set_joint_damping.

This is a recent and significant change, but the impacts are not discussed on the user guide, and the controls reference is out of date.

It appears that usage of kp_velocity (and/or joint_damping) is necessary to provide simulator stability. See issue #273.

As we are not all experts in rigid body dynamic simulation, please provide guidelines for usage, and a discussion of how this impacts the underlying physics simulation (beyond the once per time step controls calculation in plugin).

I'm posting a companion question on answers.gazebosim.org, but this information should be shared with community on the official users guide.
